text: Horsfieldia obtusa is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is endemic to Borneo where it is confined to Sarawak. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Horsfieldia obtusa. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
